_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: Leaves
author: lennard@allosmp.de
description: LeavesMC is a high-performance Minecraft server software.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Leaves Installation Script
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apk add --no-cache curl jq

if [[ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]]; then
    echo -e "Using supplied download path: ${DL_PATH}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(eval echo "${DL_PATH}")
else
    echo -e "Checking for valid version..."
    VERSIONS=$(curl -s 'https://api.leavesmc.org/v2/projects/leaves' | jq -r '.versions[]')
    VER_EXISTS=$(echo "${VERSIONS}" | grep -w "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}")
    LATEST_VERSION=$(echo "${VERSIONS}" | tail -n 1)

    if [[ -n "${VER_EXISTS}" ]]; then
        echo -e "Version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION} is valid"
    else
        echo -e "Version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION} not found, defaulting to latest: ${LATEST_VERSION}"
        MINECRAFT_VERSION=${LATEST_VERSION}
    fi

    echo -e "Checking for valid build..."
    BUILDS=$(curl -s "https://api.leavesmc.org/v2/projects/leaves/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" | jq -r '.builds[]')
    BUILD_EXISTS=$(echo "${BUILDS}" | grep -w "${BUILD_NUMBER}")
    LATEST_BUILD=$(echo "${BUILDS}" | tail -n 1)

    if [[ -n "${BUILD_EXISTS}" ]]; then
        echo -e "Build ${BUILD_NUMBER} is valid for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
    else
        echo -e "Build ${BUILD_NUMBER} not found, defaulting to latest: ${LATEST_BUILD}"
        BUILD_NUMBER=${LATEST_BUILD}
    fi

    DOWNLOAD_URL="https://api.leavesmc.org/v2/projects/leaves/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/application"
fi

curl -o server.jar "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

mv server.jar ${SERVER_JARFILE}

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run.
